StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetOso369EvalRemarkAndSignatures]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@TrainingFileID uniqueidentifier
AS
BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT me.ID, me.Remarks, RsCoSignature, U1.FirstName RsCoFirstName, U1.MiddleName RsCoMiddleName, U1.LastName RsCoLastName, me.RsCoSignDate, me.AopSignature, U2.FirstName AopFirstName, U2.MiddleName AopMiddleName, U2.LastName AopLastName, me.AopSignDate, me.OsoSignature, U3.FirstName OsoFirstName, U3.MiddleName OsoMiddleName, U3.LastName OsoLastName, me.OsoSignDate FROM USMC.Mul.MonthEvalua.on me JOIN USMC.TrainingFile AS . ON ..ID = me.TrainingFileID LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissUserMgmtUser AS U1 ON U1.UserID = me.RsCoSignature LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissUserMgmtUser AS U2 ON U2.UserID = me.AopSignature LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissUserMgmtUser AS U3 ON U3.UserID = me.OsoSignature WHERE ..ID=@TrainingFileID
END
